summary:
- Engaged in **research** and **software engineering** activities for both internal and European projects.
- Engineered software systems using **NLP** models for automated information extraction from documents[.](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1L6Z0OyjQeAnC0jQHD2gwlCkpdHVamFZRBCvjQ9HeUqE/edit?usp=share_link)
- Applied **large language models (LLMs)** across multiple applications (e.g. question answering, clustering, text generation, triplet extraction, ...)[.](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1mBParfxrDuC-Lcl6bqwg3H-V9XVQeAAUTMSIaPgsDq8/edit?usp=share_link)
- Worked on image super-resolution employing Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs)[.](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1_lDLCul3abuaLzsZgNHfpEM7gVYoMllNQER-DfF5M3o/edit?usp=share_link)

- Involved in **research** and **software engineering** activities for European projects.
- Contributed to the design, implementation, and ongoing maintenance of a distributed system analyzing social media[.](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1wkjZ1XoceC-gyJw2gNJaHi_Ah2SswVCXp1Y-WbchKgY/edit?usp=share_link)
- Applied **NLP methods** for analyzing and processing textual data sources[.](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1e8QeK98O-D21JCtivVJ5fJGrR8W9cIRZuDxsa1Y9xR8/edit?usp=share_link)
